metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1774

Platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise Workstation Extension 12 SP5

metadata.Description: The HWP filter in LibreOffice before 4.3.7 and 4.4.x before 4.4.2 and Apache OpenOffice before 4.1.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted HWP document, which triggers an out-of-bounds write.

criterions.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 12 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Workstation Extension 12 is installed
